name: Allied World War VR PRO - Full Battleship Version
name_original: Allied World War VR PRO - Full Battleship Version
description:
** THIS VERSION HAS NO IN GAME ADS **

Get ready for war! You are on a WWII battleship in the South Pacific as you are assigned to helm the primary gun on the deck. Take out enemy ships, fighter planes, and submarines in this exciting WW2 action game.

How long can your ship survive the assaulting waves? Upgrade your gun for maximum firepower and sink enemy ships with torpedoes.

Do you have what it takes to come out victorious!

FEATURES:

- Awesome guns and torpedoes.
- In-game weapon upgrades!
- Multiple guns to purchase.
- 3 unique battlegrounds to experience!
